rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg001
rows.name:
Wow!
What an incredible place!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg002
rows.name:
The innkeeper
really knows about some cool spots!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg003
rows.name:
Yes, indeed...
It's truly a breathtaking view.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg004
rows.name: It's stimulating my creative urge.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg005
rows.name:
Hey Yoshitsune,
are you planning to write another story?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg006
rows.name:
Yes, gazing at this view
brings all sorts of ideas to mind.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg007
rows.name: Like, for instance...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg008
rows.name:
A tale about a woman who gained
wings of freedom and took to the skies.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg009
rows.name:
What's that!
Sounds interesting!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg010
rows.name:
You should write it right away!
Start writing now!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg011
rows.name:
Well...
it's not that simple to just write it.
I need to work on the concept first.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg012
rows.name:
Hey, Kamui,
how about you become the model
for my story?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg013
rows.name: ...A model?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg014
rows.name:
Yes...
the woman with wings of freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg015
rows.name:
It's perfect for someone
as free-spirited as you,
especially since you already have wings.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg016
rows.name: I-is that so~?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg017
rows.name:
Then, for starters...
how about trying to fly from here?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg018
rows.name:
Yeah!
Sure thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg019
rows.name: What should I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg020
rows.name:
Fly!? From here?
Wait, Kamui, you can fly!?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg021
rows.name:
Indeed... You really do
live by your own rules, Kamui.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg022
rows.name: What should I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg023
rows.name:
Fly!? From here?
Wait, Kamui, you can fly!?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg024
rows.name:
Indeed...
Kamui is always living freely.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg025
rows.name: What shall I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg026
rows.name:
You're thinking of flying from here?More
 importantly,I didn't know you could fly!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg027
rows.name:
Indeed... You do live life with
great freedom, Kamui.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg028
rows.name: What should I say to Kamui?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg029
rows.name:
What? You want to fly from here?
Hold on, you can actually fly?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg030
rows.name:
For real... You really do liven
life without constraints.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg031
rows.name:
Huh? I can totally fly.
...You seriously didn't know that?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg033
rows.name:
Ah, when I say fly,
I don't mean flapping wings like a bird.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg034
rows.name:
More precisely, it's like floating
by controlling ether
with organs that resemble wings.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg035
rows.name:
But the advantage is
I'm not affected by weather or wind,
so I can fly freely wherever I want.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg036
rows.name:
hat's why they're truly
wings of freedom!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg037
rows.name:
I have an idea, Kamui.
How about flying together
with your Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg038
rows.name:
Together?
But ordinary people can't fly, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg039
rows.name: You'd carry him while flying.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg040
rows.name:
The heroine carries her irreplaceable
friend and they soar
through the sky together.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg041
rows.name:
Wouldn't that make for
a magnificent scene?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg042
rows.name:
Oh, I get it now!
That could work really well!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg043
rows.name:
Alright, let's do this!
Kamui is ready whenever you are!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg044
rows.name: Uh... I think I'll pass.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg045
rows.name: No... I'll pass.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg046
rows.name: For now... I think I'll decline.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg047
rows.name:
I appreciate it, but...
I'll have to decline.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg048
rows.name:
Huh? Why not?
...Are you scared?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg049
rows.name:
I won't drop you or anything?
Kamui isn't that clumsy~

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg050
rows.name: No, wait a moment please.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg051
rows.name:
...A heroine who accidentally
drops her friend.
I see, that would be a dramatic turn!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg052
rows.name: Let's go with that!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg054
rows.name: ...You're going to drop me?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg055
rows.name: Yes, there will be dropping.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg056
rows.name:
Now, Kamui,
please fly with your Driver right away!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg057
rows.name:
And then throw him
into the Cloud Sea with all your might!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg058
rows.name:
Okay!
Got it!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg059
rows.name: That's definitely a terrible idea!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg060
rows.name:
Hold on, hold on!
I refuse to go unless
Byakko comes with us!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg061
rows.name:
Even Kamui
can't lift two people, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg062
rows.name: Wait a moment!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg063
rows.name:
I just remembered an urgent matter...
I need to report something
to the Emperor immediately.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg064
rows.name: W-wait a sec!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg065
rows.name:
Wouldn't it be more interesting
if you flew with Yoshitsune
instead of me?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg066
rows.name:
It's too late to refuse now.
This is shaping up to be
the best comedy ever. Please cooperate.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg067
rows.name:
Exactly! For the sake of Kamui's story,
there's no escaping now!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg101
rows.name:
Of course!
Kamui always lives freely!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg102
rows.name:
But... I've been wondering lately
if that's truly freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg104
rows.name:
Hey, Drivers and Blades are
like one body and soul, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg105
rows.name:
In a way, doesn't that mean
Blades are bound to their Drivers?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg106
rows.name:
That can't really be called
true freedom... can it?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg107
rows.name: Oh? That's unexpected...

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg108
rows.name: What? How?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg109
rows.name:
That you are thinking about things
so seriously.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg110
rows.name:
I thought you were just living
by instinct and impulse.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg111
rows.name: Yoshitsune, that's rude!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg112
rows.name: Kamui also lives very thoughtfully!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg113
rows.name:
For example, let's say there's
Kamui's favorite Ochesha here.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg114
rows.name: And Rex is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg115
rows.name: And Nia is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg116
rows.name: And Meleph is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg117
rows.name: And Zeke is about to eat it.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg118
rows.name:
Kamui really wants to eat the Ochesha,
but also thinks she should hold back
for Kamui's Driver's sake.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg119
rows.name:
Real freedom is being able to choose
whether I sit back and let them eat it,
or ask to let me have some.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg120
rows.name:
Which choice to make is up to Kamui,
and whatever the outcome,
that too is Kamui's decision.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg121
rows.name: That's what freedom of choice is.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg122
rows.name:
Indeed, how you make your choices
and how you accept their consequences.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg123
rows.name: It's all within your freedom.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg124
rows.name:
However... Kamui's choice
wouldn't be either of those, would it?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg125
rows.name:
I predict you'd lose patience,
knock your Driver down,
and grab the Ochesha for yourself.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg126
rows.name: That's the only option, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg127
rows.name:
After thinking it over, I did conclude
that was the only viable option.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg128
rows.name:
But isn't that
just being selfish in the end...?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg129
rows.name:
But ultimately,
isn't that just acting selfishly...?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg130
rows.name:
Ultimately,
isn't that simply selfishness...?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg131
rows.name:
Hold on now. Isn't that
just plain selfishness in the end...?

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg132
rows.name:
Not at all!
Even selfishness is a form of freedom!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg133
rows.name:
Living unbound by constraints,
being true to who you really are.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg134
rows.name:
Never doing what you dislike!
Only doing what you enjoy!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg135
rows.name: That's Kamui's ideal of living freely!

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg137
rows.name:
Ah, so it's a story about a woman
embodying freedom...
Yes, that angle could definitely work.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg138
rows.name:
This is going to make
an excellent comedy.

rows.label: kizunatalk051_msg139
rows.name:
So, to complete Kamui's story,
I hope you'll continue to freely
go along with me!
